eternals_first_touch_sub_title: Track your champion stats. Highlight your accomplishments. Prove your Mastery.
eternals_first_touch_feature_left_subtit: Unlock Eternals sets for your favorite champs in the new Progression tab or in the store.
eternals_first_touch_feature_center_subt: Track your progress and clear unique milestones for every champion.
eternals_first_touch_feature_right_subti: Upgrade your Mastery emote and show the world what a real main looks like.
